nodes.text: Hypernautics was an engineering specialization relating to the design, modification and repairing of starships. The planet Esseles in the Darpa sector, particularly its capital city of Calamar (a center of high-tech research and development), specialized in hypernautics and advanced hyperdrive engines. Fia was a qualified hypernautics engineer, having graduated from Corellia University's School of Starship Engineering.
